feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add method for getting teamId permissions PBAC by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22375
  • refactor: convert EventTypeRepository to use dependency injection pattern by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22397
  • fix: members page crash with pbac feature flag by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22409
  • refactor: convert RoutingFormResponseRepository to use dependency injection pattern by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22408
  • chore: update i18n workflow to use Node.js 20 by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22403
  • docs: Update Organization Readme by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22060
  • feat: inject required repositories into AvailableSlotsService using dependency injection by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22413
  • feat: expose AvailabilitySettingsProps type in @calcom/atoms by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22246
  • fix: ESLint Plugin Loading Error with TypeScript 5.0+ Extends Arrays by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22402
  • fix: e2e tests flakes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22415
  • fix: validate Round Robin host availability in handleNewBooking by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22253
  • feat: update translations via @LingoDotDev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22416
  • feat: v2 bookings return rescheduledToUid by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22289
  • fix: ensure isBookingDryRun prop works for booking creation by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22182
  • perf: Tasker performance improvements by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22395
  • fix: locks eslint to v8 across monorepo by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22424
  • fix: third part token auth strategy by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22374
  • chore: version packages by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22418
  • fix: add validation for empty hosts in round robin reassignment by @devin-ai-integration[bot] in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22429
  • fix: validate eventTypeId is number in API v1 bookings endpoint by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22433
  • chore: Loosen Platform CODEOWNERS files by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22432
  • perf: Remove me.get call in event-types / availability by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22336
  • refactor: replace i18n HTTP requests with build-time bundling by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22422
  • feat: add race condition test for calendar-cache-serve booking flow by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22401
  • fix: translation bundler logic by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22459
  • feat: Add cancelledBy input to cancellation page by @iharsh02 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18770
  • fix: get v2/calendars existing record conflict by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22286
  • docs: v2 workflows and disable on prefill booking fields by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22445
  • fix: interpolate appName in invalid_credential message by @iamashishxo in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22448
  • Revert "feat: Add cancelledBy input to cancellation page" by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22479
  • feat: v2 managed orgs filters by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22420
  • feat: added cancelled by to booking detail view by @Praashh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18521
  • fix: increase v2 e2e instance size by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22481
  • feat: make Members tab open in new tab with external link icon by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22471
  • Fix typo "{l" in event-type causing syntax error by @rxmie24 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22474
  • feat: remove Event Types from team settings navigation by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22472
  • fix: uncheck requires Confirmation for FreeEmail when uncheck requires confirmation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22486
  • fix: added custom filter for time select by @parteekmalik in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21717
  • revert: "refactor: replace i18n HTTP requests with build-time bundling (#22422)" by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22496
  • Revert "feat: add race condition test for calendar-cache-serve booking flow" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22507
  • fix: CalDAV credential verification between multiple instances by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22331

New Contributors

  • @iharsh02 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18770
  • @iamashishxo made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22448
  • @rxmie24 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22474

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.19...v5.4.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • test: Add e2e for prerendering headless router with attribute routing by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22080
  • fix: resolve unique constraint violations in listWithTeam integration test by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22493
  • feat: convert InsightsBookingService to use Prisma.sql raw queries by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22345

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.20...v5.5.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Add new route to create team routing-form response again(after revert earlier) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22407
  • fix: Use WEBAPP_URL for org members new tab by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22568
  • fix: v2 managed event type creation hosts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22584
  • fix: don't schedule reminder from the past by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22353
  • fix: update styles of charts on /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22557
  • feat: make Salesforce WriteToObjectSettings entries editable with save/cancel functionality by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22440
  • fix: Create new Daily room if original expired during past booking reschedule by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22591
  • fix: add missing ref parameter to SatSymbol forwardRef component by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22274
  • fix: Create RoutingFormResponseService to get field value from identifier by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22396
  • perf: Faster logic by preventing instanceof Dayjs in slots.ts by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22590

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.5.1...v5.5.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: add BrowserStack attribution to README by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22615
  • fix: Use org slug in link to members page from settings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22612
  • fix: don't use unpublished org in any credit context by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22600
  • feat: team roles ui pbac by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22585
  • fix: Code Quality improvements to response record endpoint and added unit tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22264
  • fix: Editing RR weights adds all hosts by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22623
  • feat: preview default roles permissions by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22621
  • fix: API handler response termination logic by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22575
  • fix: v2 ignore permissions check for 3rd party oauth by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22588
  • fix: update enterprise sales URL from i.cal.com to go.cal.com by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22627
  • perf: Prevent parse when object is empty, resulting in a truthy value by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22625
  • fix: remove team plan check by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22628
  • chore(eslint): add no-this-in-static-method rule to prevent context loss by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22410
  • feat: add 2FA status column to organization members table by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22564

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.5.2...v5.5.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.5.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add test to verify unpublished platform orgs are excluded from credit usage by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22567
  • feat: add hourly booking charts on /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22619
  • feat: include record IDs in Salesforce assignment reason strings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22561
  • feat: add calendar cache status and actions by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22532
  • fix: issues found in PBAC creation by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22659

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.5.3...v5.5.4
